mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productReview(orderDetailNum, score, review, productNum, memberIdx, reviewDate, showReview, answerStatus) VALUES(#{num}, #{score}, #{review}, #{productNum}, #{memberIdx}, SYSDATE, 1, 0)
INSERT INTO productReviewFile(fileNum, orderDetailNum, filename) VALUES(productReviewFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderDetailNum}, #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) count, ROUND(NVL(AVG(score), 0), 1) ave, COUNT(DECODE(score, 1, 1)) score1, COUNT(DECODE(score, 2, 1)) score2, COUNT(DECODE(score, 3, 1)) score3, COUNT(DECODE(score, 4, 1)) score4, COUNT(DECODE(score, 5, 1)) score5 FROM productReview WHERE productNum = #{productNum} AND showReview = 1

SELECT pr.num, pr.memberIdx, userName, score, review, answer, productNum, filename, TO_CHAR(reviewDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reviewDate, TO_CHAR(answerDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') answerDate FROM productReview pr JOIN member1 m ON pr.memberIdx = m.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT orderDetailNum, LISTAGG(filename, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY fileNum) filename FROM productReviewFile GROUP BY orderDetailNum ) f ON pr.num = f.num WHERE pr.productNum = #{productNum} AND showReview = 1
ORDER BY score DESC, reviewDate DESC
ORDER BY score ASC, reviewDate DESC
ORDER BY reviewDate DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
